ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Pioneer 10 Trapped Radiation Detector (TRD) 30-m Count Rate Summary Data
ResourceHeader.Description: This ASCII data set contains 30-min count rates for 21 "pulse-counting" channels from a Cerenkov counter (which measures, via 3 discrimination levels, electrons >6 MeV plus nuclei >480 MeV/n, electrons >9 MeV plus nuclei >550 MeV/n, and electrons >13 MeV plus nuclei >650 MeV/n), an electron scatter detector (nuclei >80 MeV/n and electrons >0.16, >0.255, >0.46 MeV), and a minimizing ionizing particle counter (nuclei >80 MeV and electrons >35 MeV. The data set also contains 30-min averaged currents from the Cerenkov counter and two scintillators, spacecraft position and attitude data, and various other statistical and housekeeping data. The electrometer-based currents data are not reliable. The data are all for mission cruise phases and not planetary encounters.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the PI, R. Walker Fillius, and the GSFC Space Physics Data Facility.

HTTPS from SPDF

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the PI, R. Walker Fillius, and the GSFC Space Physics Data Facility

Parameter.Name: Particle counts for 21 channels over 30 minutes
Parameter.Description: Counts registered for each of the 21 channels (3 discriminator levels x 3 voltage modes for each of 2 sensors, plus 3 discriminator levels for the third sensor), summed over each reading made during the 30-min interval
Parameter.Caveats: See the information URL cited above

Parameter.Name: Accumulation times for 21 channels over 30 minutes
Parameter.Description: Durations over which counts were registered for each of the 21 channels during this interval

Parameter.Name: Numbers of measurements during the 30 minutes
Parameter.Description: Numbers of readings of counts for each of the 21 channels during this 30-min interval

Structure.Description: 21 numbers of measurements as described above
